tool_input.command:
cd /Users/aviator/AI/Home-Ops/apps/home-ops/kubernetes && \
find . -name "*.yaml" -type f -exec grep -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas" {} \; | wc -l

\
rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community" | wc -l

cd /Users/aviator/AI/Home-Ops/apps/home-ops/kubernetes && \
# Replace fluxcd-community HelmRelease schemas
rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/helmrelease-helm-v2.json" . 2>/dev/null | \
xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/helmrelease-helm-v2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/helm.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrelease_v2.json|g' {} 2>/dev/null
echo "Replaced fluxcd-community HelmRelease schemas"

cd /Users/aviator/AI/Home-Ops/apps/home-ops/kubernetes && \
# Replace fluxcd-community OCIRepository schemas (v1beta2 to v1)
rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas.*ocirepository" . 2>/dev/null | \
xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/ocirepository-source-v1beta2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|g' {} 2>/dev/null
echo "Replaced fluxcd-community OCIRepository schemas"

cd /Users/aviator/AI/Home-Ops/apps/home-ops/kubernetes && \
# Replace fluxcd-community Kustomization schemas
rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/kustomization-kustomize-v1.json" . 2>/dev/null | \
xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/kustomization-kustomize-v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/kustomize.toolkit.fluxcd.io/kustomization_v1.json|g' {} 2>/dev/null
echo "Replaced fluxcd-community Kustomization schemas"

\
# Replace remaining fluxcd-community patterns (HelmRepository)
rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community" . 2>/dev/null | head -5

\
rg "raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community" . -o 2>/dev/null | grep -v "\.json:" | sort -u

\
rg "yaml-language-server.*fluxcd-community" . 2>/dev/null

tool_response.stdout:
./logs/pre_tool_use.json:      "command": "\\\nrg \"yaml-language-server.*fluxcd-community\" . 2>/dev/null",
./apps/system-controller/k8tz/app/helmrepository.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json
./components/common/repos/app-template/ocirepository.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/ocirepository-source-v1.json
./apps/flux-system/flux-instance/app/receiver.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/receiver-notification-v1.json
./flux/meta/repos/external-dns.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json
./flux/meta/repos/emqx-charts.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json
./flux/meta/repos/nats.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json
./flux/meta/repos/surrealdb.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json
./apps/system/volsync/app/helmrelease.yaml:# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json

tool_input.command:
\
# Replace HelmRepository schemas
for f in $(rg -l "fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas.*helmrepository-source-v1.json" . 2>/dev/null | grep -v "\.json$"); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/refs/heads/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/helmrepository-source-v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced HelmRepository schemas"

\
# Replace OCIRepository schemas (v1 version)
for f in $(rg -l "fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/ocirepository-source-v1.json" . 2>/dev/null | grep -v "\.json$"); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/ocirepository-source-v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced OCIRepository v1 schemas"

\
# Replace Receiver schemas
for f in $(rg -l "fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/receiver-notification-v1.json" . 2>/dev/null | grep -v "\.json$"); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxcd-community/flux2-schemas/main/receiver-notification-v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/notification.toolkit.fluxcd.io/receiver_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced Receiver schemas"

\
# Verify remaining fluxcd-community
rg "yaml-language-server.*fluxcd-community" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l

\
# Replace crd.movishell.pl HelmRelease schemas
for f in $(rg -l "crd.movishell.pl/helm.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrelease" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/helm.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrelease_v2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/helm.toolkit.fluxcd.io/helmrelease_v2.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced crd.movishell.pl HelmRelease schemas"

\
# Replace crd.movishell.pl other resources
for f in $(rg -l "crd.movishell.pl" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  # OCIRepository
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1beta2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # CNPG Cluster
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/postgresql.cnpg.io/cluster_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/postgresql.cnpg.io/cluster_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # CNPG ScheduledBackup
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/postgresql.cnpg.io/scheduledbackup_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/postgresql.cnpg.io/scheduledbackup_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # Dragonfly
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/dragonflydb.io/dragonfly_v1alpha1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/dragonflydb.io/dragonfly_v1alpha1.json|g' "$f"
  # PodMonitor
  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/monitoring.coreos.com/podmonitor_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/monitoring.coreos.com/podmonitor_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced crd.movishell.pl other schemas"

\
# Replace datreeio ExternalSecret v1 schemas
for f in $(rg -l "datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1.json" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced datreeio ExternalSecret v1 schemas"

\
# Replace datreeio ExternalSecret v1beta1 schemas (upgrade to v1)
for f in $(rg -l "datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1beta1.json" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1beta1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced datreeio ExternalSecret v1beta1 schemas"

\
# Replace remaining datreeio patterns
for f in $(rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  # ClusterIssuer
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/cert-manager.io/clusterissuer_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/cert-manager.io/clusterissuer_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # Certificate
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/cert-manager.io/certificate_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/cert-manager.io/certificate_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # EMQX
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/apps.emqx.io/emqx_v2beta1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/apps.emqx.io/emqx_v2beta1.json|g' "$f"
  # DNSEndpoint
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/externaldns.k8s.io/dnsendpoint_v1alpha1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/externaldns.k8s.io/dnsendpoint_v1alpha1.json|g' "$f"
  # PrometheusRule
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/monitoring.coreos.com/prometheusrule_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/monitoring.coreos.com/prometheusrule_v1.json|g' "$f"
  # BucketClaim
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/objectbucket.io/objectbucketclaim_v1alpha1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/objectbucket.io/objectbucketclaim_v1alpha1.json|g' "$f"
  # JetStream Stream
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/jetstream.nats.io/stream_v1beta2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/jetstream.nats.io/stream_v1beta2.json|g' "$f"
  # HTTPRoute
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/gateway.networking.k8s.io/httproute_v1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/gateway.networking.k8s.io/httproute_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Replaced remaining datreeio schemas"

\
# Standardize bjw-s to bjw-s-labs (current repo)
for f in $(rg -l "raw.githubusercontent.com/bjw-s/helm-charts" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bjw-s/helm-charts/main/charts/other/app-template/schemas/helmrelease-helm-v2.schema.json|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bjw-s-labs/helm-charts/main/charts/other/app-template/schemas/helmrelease-helm-v2.schema.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Standardized bjw-s to bjw-s-labs"

\
# Upgrade v1beta1 ExternalSecrets to v1
for f in $(rg -l "kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1beta1.json" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1beta1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/external-secrets.io/externalsecret_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Upgraded ExternalSecret v1beta1 to v1"

\
# Upgrade v1beta2 OCIRepository to v1
for f in $(rg -l "kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1beta2.json" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null); do
  sed -i '' 's|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1beta2.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/ocirepository_v1.json|g' "$f"
done
echo "Upgraded OCIRepository v1beta2 to v1"

\
echo "=== Verification Summary ===" 
echo ""
echo "Files with fluxcd-community schemas:"
rg -c "fluxcd-community" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo ""
echo "Files with crd.movishell.pl schemas:"
rg -c "crd.movishell.pl" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo ""
echo "Files with datreeio schemas:"
rg -c "datreeio" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo ""
echo "Files with old bjw-s (not bjw-s-labs):"
rg -c "bjw-s/helm-charts" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo ""
echo "Files with kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev (standard):"
rg -c "kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo ""
echo "Files with bjw-s-labs (app-template standard):"
rg -c "bjw-s-labs" . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l

\
echo "=== Remaining Non-Standard Schemas ===" 
echo "fluxcd-community: $(rg -l 'fluxcd-community' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "crd.movishell.pl: $(rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "datreeio: $(rg -l 'datreeio' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "bjw-s (old): $(rg -l 'bjw-s/helm-charts' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo ""
echo "=== Standard Schemas ===" 
echo "kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev: $(rg -l 'kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "bjw-s-labs: $(rg -l 'bjw-s-labs' . --glob '!*.json' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"

tool_response.stdout:
=== Remaining Non-Standard Schemas ===
fluxcd-community:        0
crd.movishell.pl:        0
datreeio:        0
bjw-s (old):        0

=== Standard Schemas ===
kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev:        0
bjw-s-labs:        0

tool_input.command:
\
echo "=== Remaining Non-Standard Schemas ===" 
echo "fluxcd-community: $(rg -l 'fluxcd-community' . --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "crd.movishell.pl: $(rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' . --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"

echo "bjw-s-labs: $(rg -l 'bjw-s-labs' . --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"

tool_input.command: pwd

\
rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' . --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | head -5
rg 'crd.movishell.pl' . 2>/dev/null | head -10

  sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/dragonflydb.io/dragonfly_v1alpha1.json|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/dragonflydb.io/dragonfly_v1alpha1.json|g' "$f"

echo "=== Remaining Non-Standard Schemas (YAML only, no logs) ===" 
echo "fluxcd-community: $(rg -l 'fluxcd-community' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "crd.movishell.pl: $(rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"

apps/database/cloudnative-pg/cluster-17/scheduledbackup.yaml:crd.movishell.pl

apps/cert-manager/cert-manager/app/clusterissuer.yaml:datreeio
apps/database/emqx/cluster/cluster.yaml:datreeio

# Replace ALL crd.movishell.pl URLs (any resource type)
rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | \
  xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://crd.movishell.pl/|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/|g' {}
echo "Replaced all crd.movishell.pl schemas"

\
# Replace ALL datreeio URLs

  xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datreeio/CRDs-catalog/main/|https://kubernetes-schemas.pages.dev/|g' {}
echo "Replaced all datreeio schemas"

\
# Replace ALL old bjw-s URLs
rg -l 'bjw-s/helm-charts' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | \
  xargs -I {} sed -i '' 's|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bjw-s/helm-charts/|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bjw-s-labs/helm-charts/|g' {}
echo "Replaced all old bjw-s schemas"

\

echo "crd.movishell.pl: $(rg -l 'crd.movishell.pl' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "datreeio: $(rg -l 'datreeio' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"

echo "bjw-s-labs: $(rg -l 'bjw-s-labs' apps flux components --glob '*.yaml' 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
